original_title: 上司の奥さんが夫に内緒で始めた過激な裏オプメンズエステ
overview: The beauty salon that the boss's wife opened at home. The number of customers is excellent and it seems that he decided to treat male customers as well without telling his boss. So I was asked to be a practice partner, so I decided to take it easy for my boss's wife, who has been indebted to me on a daily basis.
title: The Boss’s Wife Began A Radical Back Op Men’s Este Without Telling Her Husband Saiharu Natsume
